statements: DELETE FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age < 30 AND rights_protected IS TRUE;
DELETE FROM vulnerable_population WHERE age > 50 AND gender = 'female';
DELETE FROM rights_protection WHERE population_id IN (SELECT id FROM vulnerable_population WHERE location = 'City A') AND protection_status = 'active';
DELETE FROM ProtectionStatus WHERE person_id = 100 AND protection_level = 'High';
DELETE FROM incidents WHERE incident_type = 'Violence' AND incident_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM advocacy_groups WHERE group_name = 'Human Rights Watch';
DELETE FROM rights_protection WHERE category = 'Civil Rights' AND issue = 'Discrimination';
